titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Office of the President, Yale University, Records
Office of the President, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:24

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, a notebook, and subject files documenting activities of academic units, development and alumni affairs, finance, legal affairs, and agencies and organizations affiliated with Yale University. The records span the administrations of several presidents of Yale University.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-A (YRG 2-A), Records of the Yale president's office.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: President's Office, Yale University, Records (RU 834). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, a notebook, and subject files documenting activities of academic units, development and alumni affairs, finance, legal affairs, and agencies and organizations affiliated with Yale University. The records span the administrations of several presidents of Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "Yale Blue" notebook contains correspondence, swatches, and a history of the development of the particular shade of blue used by Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
